languages.text: These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines, servitors and other forms of automation.
languages.original_text: На индустриальных мирах население довольно малочисленно, по сравнению с мирами-ульями или мирами-кузнями. Несмотря на то, что те виды миров тоже посвящены промышленности, на индустриальных мирах большая часть работ выполняется с помощью машин, а производство сильно автоматизировано.

traits.locale_text: These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines and other forms of advanced automation.

These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines and other forms of advanced automation.

These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines, servitors and other forms of automation.

languages.text: На индустриальных мирах население довольно малочисленно, по сравнению с мирами-ульями или мирами-кузнями. Несмотря на то, что те виды миров тоже посвящены промышленности, на индустриальных мирах большая часть работ выполняется с помощью машин, а производство сильно автоматизировано.

Diese Welten sind im Vergleich zu Makropolwelten oder Fabrikwelten dünn besiedelt und oft stark auf industrielle Aktivitäten ausgerichtet, da die meiste Arbeit auf wahren Produktionswelten von Maschinen, Servitoren und anderen Formen der Automatisierung erledigt wird.
languages.original_text: These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines, servitors and other forms of automation.

traits.locale_text: Diese Welten sind im Vergleich zu Makropolwelten oder Fabrikwelten dünn besiedelt und oft stark auf industrielle Aktivitäten ausgerichtet, da die meiste Arbeit auf wahren Produktionswelten von Maschinen, Servitoren und anderen Formen der Automatisierung erledigt wird.

languages.text: Ces mondes sont quasiment dépourvus de population par rapport aux mondes ruches ou aux mondes forges, qui sont également souvent consacrés aux activités industrielles, car le gros du travail sur les véritables mondes industriels est effectué par des machines, des servitors et d'autres processus automatisés.
languages.original_text: These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines, servitors and other forms of automation.

traits.locale_text: Ces mondes sont peu peuplés par rapport aux mondes ruches ou aux mondes forges, qui sont également souvent fortement dédiés aux activités industrielles, car dans les mondes industriels, les machines, les servitors et d'autres formes d'automatisation se chargent de l'essentiel.

languages.text: 与巢都世界与铸造世界相比，工业世界主要从事工业活动，人口相对较少。因为在真正的工业世界中，绝大部分工作都是通过机器、机仆与其他形式的自动化设备完成的。
languages.original_text: These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines, servitors and other forms of automation.

traits.locale_text: 与巢都世界与铸造世界相比，工业世界主要从事工业活动，人口相对较少。因为在真正的工业世界中，绝大部分工作都是通过机器、奴工与其他形式的自动化设备完成的。

languages.text: これらの惑星は過密惑星や工業惑星に比べると人口がまばらで、また、真の産業惑星では労働のほとんどが機械やサーヴィターなどのオートメーションを使って行われるため、産業活動に重きを置いていることが多い。
languages.original_text: These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines, servitors and other forms of automation.

traits.locale_text: これらの惑星は過密惑星や工業惑星に比べると人口がまばらで、また、真の産業惑星では労働のほとんどが機械やサーヴィターなどのオートメーションを使って行われるため、産業活動に重きを置いていることが多い。

languages.text: Este tipo de mundos languidecen en población al compararlos con los mundos colmena o forja. Si bien estos también suelen estar dedicados a actividades industriales, la mayor parte del trabajo en los mundos industriales se realiza con máquinas, servidores y otras formas de automatización.
languages.original_text: These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines, servitors and other forms of automation.

traits.locale_text: Este tipo de mundos languidecen en población al compararlos con los mundos colmena o forja. Si bien estos también suelen estar dedicados a actividades industriales, la mayor parte del trabajo en los mundos industriales se realiza con máquinas, servidores y otras formas de automatización.

languages.text: Bu dünyalar, yoğun biçimde sınai faaliyetlere adanmış olsalar da kovan dünya veya döküm dünyalarına kıyasla daha seyrek nüfuslara sahiptirler. Bu durum; gerçek manada sınai dünyalarda işin çoğunun makine, hizmetör ve benzeri otomasyon biçimleri kullanılarak yapılmasından kaynaklanır.
languages.original_text: These worlds have sparse populations compared to hive worlds or forge worlds, which also are often heavily dedicated to industrial activities, as most of the labour on true industrial worlds is done using machines, servitors and other forms of automation.
